reviewText: Disappointed. One of the first things you see at the beginning is a dancer's pelvis in tiny shorts. This isn't ideal for my 8 year old. God calls for more modesty than that and girls should not be afraid of that.

I've used this with my leadership team as a discussion starter
It generated a great discussion which led to positive change.

The acting is terrible, the filming is terrible, but I get that they mean well by making this movie. This was a big mistake, I borrowed it from redbox for 1.29$ and I wish I didn't! This movie is AWFUL. It was worse than Kristen Stewart's acting in the entire Twilight series. Please please please don't waste your time or money.

I just finished watching Youth of Christ and it became crystal clear the effectiveness this movie will have for Christians who are struggling between two worlds.  I laughed, I cried, I became engaged with the main characters.  I could relate with several characters, particularly during my college days. I truly hope you watch the film and send it to all young adults out there.  It is time to step out of complacency and commit to honoring God and living a life that reflects that.

This is a great movie!! I highly recommend it to any Christian in need of a little encouragement while living in today's society.  It's hard to "live in this world, but not be of this world" and this movie definitely helps with that.
